title: MacBook Pro 16-inch M3 Max
description: Revolutionary MacBook Pro featuring the powerful M3 Max chip with 16-core CPU and 40-core GPU. Stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology delivers exceptional brightness and contrast. Up to 128GB unified memory and 8TB SSD storage for professional workflows. Features advanced thermal design, studio-quality microphones, six-speaker sound system, and up to 22 hours of battery life. Perfect for video editing, 3D rendering, software development, music production, and demanding creative work.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancelling wireless headphones with exceptional sound quality and comfort. Perfect for travel, commuting, work from home, music production, and audiophile listening.

title: Rolex Submariner Date

Perfect for diving, professional use, luxury collection, investment piece, and formal occasions.

title: Canon EOS R5 Mirrorless Camera
description: Professional full-frame mirrorless camera with 45MP sensor and 8K RAW video recording. Features advanced Dual Pixel CMOS AF II with eye detection for humans and animals. In-body 5-axis image stabilization up to 8 stops. Shoots 20fps electronic shutter and 12fps mechanical. Weather-sealed magnesium alloy body. Dual card slots support CFexpress and SD. Perfect for wedding photography, wildlife, sports, commercial work, and videography.
